svg.title: Test: width:auto; height:70px; width="49%" height="0"
svg.desc: This testcase checks that the intrinsic width will be taken as the used width when the CSS 'width' property is set to 'auto', the 'height' property is set to some other value, and there is no intrinsic ratio. You should see a blue rectangle 49% wide and 70px high when viewing this file.
